title: PBE update saves
body: I think when servers shut down for maintenance your client should still be able to update/install. I've tried installing the PBE client 2 times now, both got to around half way and the servers shut down for maintenance, and when they come back up, I have to start the entire thing over. =( and let me tell ya, when the best net in my are is around 700kb/s Its a struggle, IMO it should pick back up where it left off or have a save point in there somewhere unless my stuff is just messed up or I'm a monkey and doing it wrong lol and hey if i am, let me know.. GG and Ty in advance

replies.body: Hey, Thanks man probably my Net service isn't up to par who knows, ill keep trying.

If an update is cancelled, the patcher needs to rescan for files because there is a possibility for the files becoming corrupted.  Maintenance should not impact your progress, though.  It sounds like there might be a more underlying connection issues struggling to grab updates, so just in case I recommend running through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your connection runs smoothly.  I hope that helps!
